lead_paragraph: Peter Arnett, the former CNN war correspondent, is heading to Afghanistan to report on the fighting there for an independent news production company called BNN. The company, which is based in New York, would not disclose the terms of its deal with Mr. Arnett, but said it had been completed earlier this month. BNN's chief executive, Steve Rosenbaum, said Mr. Arnett would fly to the region in the next couple of weeks. BNN said it planned to syndicate Mr. Arnett's live and taped reports from the front and sell them to foreign and domestic television news outlets.
